Package controller

Contains interfaces and controllers that encapsulate the flow of the program
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    LoginEvent
    Interface tasked with login and register events
    MenuEvent
    Interface tasked with session exiting events
    PlaylistBarEvent
    Interface tasked with actions related to the music player
    PlaylistEvent
    Interface tasked with actions related to the "Playlists" tab
    PlaylistRequest
    Interface tasked with playing playlists
    PlaysManager
    Interface tasked with adding plays data to the database
    RankingEvent
    Interface tasked with requesting data to generate the statistics
    RecordingEvent
    Interface tasked with actions regarding the recording of songs and muting the song the user is trying to play on the piano
    SongEnder
    Interface tasked with notifying when a song finished playing
    SongNotifier
    Interface tasked with informing when a song should be added to the database
    SongRequest
    Interface tasked with requesting a song to play
    SongRequestPiano
    Interface for requesting a song to play on the piano
    SongsEvent
    Interfaces tasked with actions done in the "Songs" tab
    SongValidator
    Interface tasked with requesting validations of notes to be played in NotePlayer (if not null)
    TeclaEvent
    Interface tasked with events of note presses and releases in the piano
    UpdateConfigEvent
    Events of configuration updates
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Controller
    Class that controls the flow of the program
    MusicController
    Class that manages the songs played in the music player
    PianoController
    Class tasked with recording user's songs and playing songs on the keyboard
    RankingHourUpdater
    Notifies the graph each SECONDS_PER_UPDATE seconds (to update the hour and the external users plays)
    SongDownloader
    Class that notifies every time a new scrapping should happen
